DataElement.preferredName: Equipment Facility Department Name 64 Character Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A character string which describes the name of the Department within the institution where the equipment used to create the image instance is located.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Name of the Department within the institution where the equipment that contributed to the composite instance is located._Services and space and equipment provided for a particular purpose; a building or place that provides a particular service or is used for a particular industry._A specialized division of a large organization._An object needed to perform a diagnostic, therapeutic or research activity.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An object needed to perform a diagnostic, therapeutic or research activity.

Concepts.definition: A manufactured object that is used to perform diagnostic, therapeutic or research activities.

Property.preferredDefinition: Services and space and equipment provided for a particular purpose; a building or place that provides a particular service or is used for a particular industry.:A specialized division of a large organization.:The words or language units by which a thing is known.

A specialized division of a large organization.
The words or language units by which a thing is known.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.

DataElementConcept.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 11/5/19 jk DICOM CDE; Released per qtrly metric review.  10/30/13 created to make semantics consistent with other DICOM standard CDEs. Reused OC; moved facility to Property. jc

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: LO: A 64-character string with leading or trailing spaces being non-significant; NO CONTROL characters. [Standard-based]

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An expression consisting of a linear sequence of symbols (characters or words or phrases).:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: An expression consisting of a linear sequence of symbols (characters or words or phrases).

ValueDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
ValueDomain.changeDescription: 10/30/13 added DICOM RT CSI. jc 3/16/09 - set min length from 0 to 1. 2007 DICOM Standard - Sections 5 & 6 2006 DICOM Standard - Sections 5 & 6

ReferenceDocuments.name: DICOM Reference
ReferenceDocuments.description: PS 3.3-2011: Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine (DICOM), Part 3: Information Object Definitions

DataElement.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
DataElement.changeDescription: 11/5/19 jk DICOM CDE; Released per qtrly metric review.  12/17/13 jc added DICOM 2011 reference.  10/30/13 CDE versioned to reuse OC 2236764 for consistency with existing Equipment Standard CDEs; intent of CDE not changed. jc  4/8/09 removed from imaging set 1 of proposed data standards pending resolution by caBIG CDE Leadership team of existing Address data standard.
